content: too cool ~ love how you can see the lights for miles. . .and them waving at you! choose joy each day
reply: too cool ~ love how you can see the lights for miles. . .and them waving at you! choose joy each day
title: Run For The Wall 2009

content: quote: Originally posted by MissU2: too cool ~ love how you can see the lights for miles. . .and them waving at you! Oh, I know. I loved them waving at us. Dennis put an American and Marine flag over the bridge so they all saw it too. They should be getting pretty close to DC. They left here Sunday morning around 8:00 am. There is also a northern route too. They started in CA.
quote: Originally posted by MissU2: too cool ~ love how you can see the lights for miles. . .and them waving at you!
reply: Oh, I know. I loved them waving at us. Dennis put an American and Marine flag over the bridge so they all saw it too. They should be getting pretty close to DC. They left here Sunday morning around 8:00 am. There is also a northern route too. They started in CA.

content: We met another couple on the bridge too. He is also a Nam Vet. They have a friend, Doug James he is a Road Captain for the ride every year. Dana and her hub usually ride to the Wall, but they couldn't this year. Here is a pix of Dana, cute as she can be and both were very nice. We live about 3 miles apart, we will be keeping intouch. This is her business card, I deleted her phone number and email for safety reasons and cause I will get in trouble too, and I don't want to gt in trouble on here, lol.
